title: Google is not sending a Pixel 3a for warranty replacement. I want a refund.
content:
The speakerphone stopped working for the second time since I purchased my Pixel 3a(this is my replacement device). I contacted google support again. They took 10 days to get back to me, and the only option they provided was to ship my phone to them(now I do not have functioning phone). Its been almost 3 weeks since I shipped it and the support representative has no clue what the status of the return is. I've had over 50 emails back and forth with them.

I do not want to deal with this anymore, I'd like a refund for my device. Its unacceptable that I get to have a usable phone for only 10 months of a year.
